text: "Who are you supposed to do if you want to..." started Ford eventually.

passages.full_quote: <used>Who are you supposed to</used> be, for heaven's sake?

passages.fragment: are you supposed to do if you
passages.full_quote: "You think you've got problems," said Marvin as if he was addressing a newly occupied coffin, "what <used>are you supposed to do if you</used> are a manically depressed robot"

passages.fragment: to do if you want to
passages.full_quote: Here is what <used>to do if you want to</used> get a lift from a Vogon: forget it

passages.fragment: if you want to ... '' started Ford eventually
passages.full_quote: "Listen old friend, <used>if you want to..." started Ford eventually</used>
